title: Table 5
content:
| Whom to Contact | Contact Information | Support Provided |
| --- | --- | --- |
| BCBSIL Health Advocate (Copay or HSA) | 1.800.247.9207 | · Care coordination program · Centers of Excellence · Clinical advocacy support, · Narrow network guidelines including targeted support for specific conditions · Claim appeals · Bill review · ID card requests · Claim status · Pre-authorization or predetermination of benefits |
| UHC Care Coordinator (Copay or HSA) | 1.844.859.5007 |  |
| BCBSIL | 1.855.453.4747 www.luminarehealth.com/companya/myvc Virtual PCP (select on the Blue Element Mobile IL mobile app or at myBlueElementIL.com) | Contact your Teladoc virtual PCP to coordinate your care |
| myVirtualCare Access: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Illinois/Teladoc |  |  |
